document_types.name: Invoice
document_types.description: A document requesting payment for goods or services. Look for total amount, payment terms, invoice number, and itemized lists of charges.

document_types.name: Contract
document_types.description: A formal agreement between parties. Look for signatures, terms and conditions, dates of validity, and party names.

document_types.name: Letter
document_types.description: A written communication from one party to another. Look for greeting, signature, and letter format.

document_types.name: Report
document_types.description: A document presenting information, analysis, or findings. Look for sections, data, conclusions, and recommendations.

document_types.name: Form
document_types.description: A document with fields for collecting information. Look for blank spaces, checkboxes, and signature lines.

document_types.name: Certificate
document_types.description: A document certifying a fact, qualification, or accomplishment. Look for official seals, signatures, and formal language.

document_types.name: Statement
document_types.description: A document showing account activity or balance. Look for transaction history, account numbers, and balance information.

document_types.name: Notice
document_types.description: A document providing information or warning. Look for announcements, deadlines, and important dates.

document_types.name: Memo
document_types.description: A brief communication within an organization. Look for short format, specific topics, and internal distribution.

document_types.name: Receipt
document_types.description: A document acknowledging payment. Look for amount paid, date, items purchased, and merchant information.
